QuestData.Title: Rejoining the Forest
QuestData.Description: It is time to say goodbye now. You have raised me from a seedling, brief though it was, but now I must rejoin the forest.$B$BTake me back to the hill you found me on. There I will set my roots, and grow in the shadow of the ancients that came before me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Flourishing Protector back to the hill in the center of Irontree Woods.
QuestData.RewardText: Someday I will spread my branches across a renewed forest, full of life and hope.$B$BFarewell, $n. Have patience... and if you live long, you may see me again one day.
